dct_title_s: Karte von dem Abendlændischen Ocean : zur allgemeinen Historie der Reise-beschreibungen entworfen
dct_description_sm: Nautical chart of North Atlantic Ocean with portions of North and South America, Southern Europe and West Africa; relief shown pictorially. In lower right-hand corner: Zusatz zum I. Bande, Ie. Karte. Probably issued in: Allgemeine Historie der Reisen zu Wasser und Lande ... Leipzig : Bey Arkstee und Merkus, 1747-1774.
dct_subject_sm: Nautical charts—North Atlantic Ocean—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Nautical charts—North Atlantic Ocean—Early works to 1800
